attributes.action: Stop homework as it ruins family time!
attributes.additional_details: I know this because homework doesn’t let me, as a teenager at secondary school, spend time with my family because I am to busy focusing on my homework. And it use to give me a lot of anxiety and now it’s mostly stress!
attributes.background: Homework doesn’t let children and teenagers spend much time with family. Revision is understandable but homework can cause lots of stress and anxiety. It needs to stop
